course.title: History of Modern Turkey through Literature
course.meeting_text: M., W., at 12, and an additional hour to be arranged.
course.description: This course surveys the history of modern Turkey and culture through Turkish literature in translation. Main focus is on topics of cultural revolution, nationalism, identity, gender, and migration. Primary readings are translations of novels, short stories, drama and poetry.
course.notes: Knowledge of Turkish not required. Not open to auditors.
